channel.title: Swearing Conversion Chart
channel.description:
[size=12pt][b]Have YOU ever been chastised about your language by family, friends or relations? WELL NOWS YOUR CHANCE TO MEND YOUR EVIL WAYS AND APPEAR MORE SOPHISTICATED.[/b] [/size]
Simply[b] replace the word you would normally say/type with the one given[/b], and your sure to appear as intellectual and polite as you really are! [b]ESPECIALLY IN CAPS![/b] [size=14pt] Fuck = Duck Fucking = Fricking/Ducking Shit = Mit Balls = Spheres Dick = Richard Cunt = Plant Prick = Mick Bastard = Lenny Bitch = Dog Piss = Urine Cum = Fly[/size]
Now id advise you all duck off my post before i punch you so hard in the spheres your first son will be a lenny and your richard wont fly into your mothers plant for ducking 60 years.
You pieces of mitt.

item.title: Swearing Conversion Chart
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“DemisePking, post:8, topic:336548”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=432918.msg3177815#msg3177815 date=1271022595]

or you will sound like a DemisePking person that makes no sense

Here’s a chart for you,
DemisePking = Absolutely Ducking Poo

fixed
[/quote]i can already tell you’re one of those fucking loser kids that stay home all day because you have no real friends to hang out with.

i’m basing that assumption on the fact that only those idiotic kind of kids have the mentality to post something as inane as this thread

nope, im just bored at 12:00 on sunday night and decided to post something that people are bound to dislike so i can laugh at the trolls.[/quote]

That would make you the troll. Now fuck off.

Read full topic

item.title: Swearing Conversion Chart
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

[size=12pt]Have YOU ever been chastised about your language by family, friends or relations?
WELL NOWS YOUR CHANCE TO MEND YOUR EVIL WAYS AND APPEAR MORE SOPHISTICATED.
[/size]

Simply replace the word you would normally say/type with the one given, and your sure to appear as intellectual and polite as you really are! ESPECIALLY IN CAPS!
[size=14pt]
Fuck = Duck
Fucking = Fricking/Ducking
Shit = Mit
Balls = Spheres
Dick = Richard
Cunt = Plant
Prick = Mick
Bastard = Lenny
Bitch = Dog
Piss = Urine
Cum = Fly[/size]

Now id advise you all duck off my post before i punch you so hard in the spheres your first son will be a lenny and your richard wont fly into your mothers plant for ducking 60 years.

You pieces of mitt.

Read full topic
